Class PlanetaryObject

java.lang.Object
PlanetaryObject
Direct Known Subclasses:
Comet, Moon, Planet, Sun
public abstract class PlanetaryObject
extends java.lang.Object
This abstract class provides a blueprint for any object to be modelled in the Solar System.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected double angle  
    protected java.lang.String colour  
    protected int diameter  
    protected double distance  
    SolarSystem solarSystem  

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.lang.String getColour()
    Returns the colour of this PlanetaryObject.
    double getDiameter()
    Returns the diameter of this PlanetaryObject.
    double[] getLocation()
    Returns the location of this PlanetaryObject in the form of Polar Coordinates.
    void setLocation​(double distance, double angle)
    Sets the location of this planetary object in the SolarSystem and draws the object at this location.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • colour

      protected java.lang.String colour

      public SolarSystem solarSystem

  • Method Details

    • getLocation

      public double[] getLocation()
      Returns the location of this PlanetaryObject in the form of Polar Coordinates. Returned in an array [distance from object of orbit, angle around object of orbit]

    • getDiameter

      public double getDiameter()
      Returns the diameter of this PlanetaryObject.

    • getColour

      public java.lang.String getColour()
      Returns the colour of this PlanetaryObject.

    • setLocation

      public void setLocation​(double distance, double angle)
      Sets the location of this planetary object in the SolarSystem and draws the object at this location.
      Parameters:
      angle - the angle (in degrees) that represents the position of this PlanetaryObject in relation to the sun.
      solarSystem - the solar system in which this PlanetaryObject exists.
